contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = You Walk Alone | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Jandek]] | Cover = | Released = 1987 | Recorded = unknown | Genre = [[Blues Rock]] | Length = 42:48 | Label = [[Corwood Industries]] | Producer = Corwood Industries | Last album = ''[[Blue Corpse]]''<br />(1987) | This album = ''You Walk Alone''<br />(1988) | Next album = ''[[On the Way (Jandek album)|On the Way]]''<br />(1988) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = ''[[Forced Exposure]]'' | rev1Score = (very favorable) <ref>[http://tisue.net/jandek/discog.html#0754 ''Forced Exposure'' review]</ref> | rev2 = | rev2Score = }} '''''You Walk Alone''''' is the sixteenth album by [[Jandek]], and the first of two released in 1988. It is [[Corwood Industries]] (#0754), and is the first album by the "blues rock" band that followed the apparent meltdown of the original "garage rock" band. ==Track listing== #Lavender – 3:49 #Time and Space – 7:28 #The Cat That Walked From Shelbyville – 6:23 #Quinn Boys II – 3:56 #The Way That You Act – 4:26 #I Know The Times – 3:17 #When The Telephone Melts – 9:06 #War Dance – 3:58 ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *[http://tisue.net/jandek/discog.html#0754 Seth Tisue's ''You Walk Alone'' review] [[Category:1988 albums]] [[Category:Corwood Industries albums]] [[Category:Jandek albums]]
